flexibility2: ability to adapt to a specific audience's needs
flexibility3: responds to current state of the world and reflects it
flexibility4: can edit appropriately according to feedback
flexibility5: can respond to time constraints appropriately

originality4: draws from personal expertise or experinece or relies on experts who do

name: Phoebe
